TopicTitle: All pods should allow storing data

Articles.Content:
What sense does it make that some command pods cannot contain science data? In my case right now it's the Mk2 airplane pod. I don't want to dump the data... is there a file I can edit to allow all command pods to accept data?

Edit: it's possible that I stored some data but couldn't store it all... it's still an objectionable mechanic. How is this data meant to be stored? There should be a hard drive or some such part.

Edit2: it's possible that I had two of the exact same data (EVA reports) - in that case it's fine and I rescind my suggestion because it makes no sense.

Edited July 13, 2016 by THX1138
That's probably what happened, duplicate data from the same biome.
